reviews_data.review_text: I've had the mocha coffee twice and it was great! The owner put real chocolate in it, not those cheap syrups.
Best place for coffee
Ktowns hidden gem, always has music going on. And pancakes  on Saturday mornings
Love this coffee shop. I come here almost every Monday. Ps get a cookie. It'll blow your socks off.

My friend and I always look forward to our weekly "coffee hour" at WCE. Unlike some of the other coffee shops in the area, Todd's coffee drinks are delicious and consistent every time. Seriously, the best. And very reasonably priced!
Todd's homemade treats are simply delightful. You gotta try one of his turnovers when he makes them! Or a cheese omelet.... SO good!

My friend and I love that he thinks of everything and goes the extra mile. When we get treats to share, Todd gives us both a plate and fork and/or knife. That may seem trivial, but we have not experienced that level of thoughtfulness at other places. It's the little things that make a big difference, and that's why Wired Coffee Espress is just the best!
Please go try his white Bianca on the menu!!! I have a newfound love for white chocolate. Add some raspberry or blueberry!!!! Perfect combos!!

The coffee is awesome and it's right near the heart of Kannapolis NC
Great venue for musicians and poets,
Sound is amazing!!
Great coffee and price much better than your big franchise coffee places!
Asked for raspberry mocha. Ended up getting regular mocha. Or at least there isn't enough raspberry.
Great little gem of a coffee shop. The homemade loaf was phenomenal. Wonderful owner who truly cares about the performing arts and locals!
Great place for a cup of  and gathering!! Thanks Todd!!

This is a nicely set up coffee shop. They have a spacious stage area, ample tables and chairs, along with comfy pub chairs.  The Chicken Salad on a croissant is very tasty,  as well as the  Blueberry Muffins. The atmosphere is welcoming and casual.  The staff is very friendly and helpful. The service is great. We enjoyed our time there.

Awesome coffee shop. So much better than a chain. Delicious coffee, smoothies  and sweet treats. Todd,  the owner, is very welcoming and makes you feel at home.  I've been to several music events here. The sound is awesome!
Smoothies!! Cookies!! Pancakes!! Oh yeah COFFEE!!
Chai tea is the best! Super friendly staff.

Tod The guy that owns the place is so nice and friendly and his coffee is amazing
I would get coffee there every day if I could

Great local spot. Singer/songwriter and open mic nights are a great way to spend an evening. Local talent on showcase is impressive. Come check it out. Enjoy a coffee, a smoothie, tasty baked goods and savory bites. Support this local business!
Awesome coffee! Wonderful food! And the live entertainment times are nice.
Nice place..I will go back ...
Little spot, not crazy about the options but it does have good coffee  I found a good drink w vanilla that I liked so I shall be back!

Fantastic coffee, great smoothies, overall great vibe and friendly staff!

My favorite coffee shop in Kannapolis.
Best coffee. Fantastic smoothies. Wonderful service.
Todd's blueberry banana smoothie is the best in the world Worlds, hands down you need to Taste it, your life depends on it.
Great coffee, great service.

Todd's coffee shop is the best place to enjoy anything your heart desires! He is the most amazing barista and just has a way with jokes! My friends and I love him and will always cherish our time with him! Stop by if you love coffee, the thought of gelato, or just love Todd! If you don't love him yet... it'll happen...
Delicious latte! Hole in the wall place but you can't judge a book by it's cover!
Great place to chill dope stage for music
Not very good. Didn't even have almond milk.
Absolutely the best coffee in Kannapolis! I was pleasantly surprised! The foam is unbelievable. The prices are excellent, and the home baked goods are delicious! You need to check this place out.
We were invited by some friends who were having a gig in this coffee shop. It's a nice shop where you can grab a cup of coffee and or a smoothie. Very yummy and the owner was super nice
This hidden gem of Kannapolis has the best coffee!
Todd was kind and generous, and the fresh raisin cookies were absolutely delicious! Also really enjoyed the caramel latte. Most places make them too sweet, but this one is perfect.
Good coffee nice place
Fantastic pancakes. Great coffee. Perfect way to start a Saturday.
Best smoothies and turnovers in the area for sure.  You owe it to yourself to check it out.
Smoothies.  Board games and tables at which to play them.  Cool vibe.
Owner is very friendly and drinks are good here, but if you are in a hurry don't stop in you'll be there for a minute while whatever you desire to slurp on is being made to order.
Had a delicious fruit smoothy!
The guy who owns the place made our order and it was some of the best made drinks weve had, they were perfect and delicious!
Friendly environment..  Owner is the sweetest! Love this place
A gem of a place. Pleasant staff, non-dairy options, comfortable seating. Can't wait for the pandemic to end so that I can attend a live-entertainment event.

The iced latte is good, they have a wide variety of flavors and nondairy milk available. I also grabbed a chocolate chip cookie and I have no regrets. It's soft-baked and has lots of chocolate chunks. I look forward to trying more baked goods.
Buen lugar
More than just coffee. Tea and smoothies, cold drinks, sodas, and sometimes some edibles. Todd can bake you just about whatever you want. Awesome place to just relax or study and get some work done.
This is an awesome shop with great coffee! Went there this morning for the first time! They have great customer service and delicious coffee! Will definitely be recommending!
Never been there should be good
Good coffee
Great coffee & atmosphere.
Great place to sing and great coffee

I wouldn't recommend this place at all. It wasn't very clean to start with, and the person making the coffee, looked like he had just come in from outside working. Also, I don't think it's very professional for the worker to sit and watch YouTube loudly while customers are in there...oh and fall asleep.
Tea and great music and amazing chocolate chip cookies, at excellent prices
"Friends don't let friends drink Starbucks."
Best coffee ever!! I literally think about being able to go here all day until I finally can.
Great spot! Nice place to chill and enjoy yummy iced lattes! The owner is always very friendly and they have chess/plenty of seating. Check it out!
Very casual and laid back. Nice place to grab a coffee with friends
Carmel mochachino yummy
Really great place. Very laid back, great service and a nice quiet atmosphere. Feels more like a home than a store. Definitely recommend.
Great music venue.

It was a nice cozy place, me and my friends stayed there for a long time and the food and drinks we got there were really good. It wasnt too crowded. If you need a nice, calm, cozy place to hang it out, I'd recommend it
Excellent coffee! Great place to relax.

Love the live music.  It is always lively and tasty.  The coffee and smoothies are tasty.  I would rather buy local and support the community than corporate coffee any day!
For musicians, it has the BEST sound system as the owner was a former sound tech for multiple touring bands.  So you always sound good on an open mic or show.
Great espresso drinks and homemade cookies to boot
Lovely Owner

Owner Todd was extremely rude
I'll never bring or family here could care less what coffee taste like if going to be treated with rudeness and disrespect

I remember Wired when it was in Gastonia! Know located in Kannapolis it remains the best hangout spot in town. Love the drinks and the owner Todd is awesome! Great guy with undeniable drinks. I highly recommend this coffee shop.
No cold Brew, no nitro, owner seems cranky. Maybe he needs a cup of coffee?
My favorite place for coffee. The Mocha Bianca is to die for...also a great place to hang with friends
Great local coffee.
Love the atmosphere and the coffee is Amazing. This is a coffee shop you need to check out!
This place is amazing. Best coffee ever, nice atmosphere, good quiet place for studying or hanging out or just spending time to yourself. This is my favorite place to be!
Best service there is, great gelato. Espressos and smoothies, it still good as ever today.
Low the hot tea and pancakes on Saturday mornings!

Best place in kannapolis to enjoy coffee and family and friends Todd the owner is great and funny a weird sense of humor, but great.. We have had Christmas dinners as well as Thanksgiving dinner, birthday party's and business meetings, church men's gatherings, planning committees, all have been GREAT. Thanks to the owner Todd.
Nice place with great coffee
Wonderful place to go! Awesome coffee anf great service! Cool vibe and dont miss open mic night! For sure!!!
Great place, with great coffee.
Great pancakes on the weekends
My favorite coffee spot. Beats the chains on price and quality. The owner, Todd, is super nice.
Quiet, hidden treat to stop for catching up on emails when working on the road.
Excellent service and the best tasting smoothies!
Great service, great coffee tea and gellato be with great prices.
Fantastic pancakes on Saturdays!
Incredible coffee! They even have live music on Friday nights! Full set up!
Good coffee and good people
Todd is the owner/wizard of this fine establishment.  He makes the experience! Beverages are solid and he usually has something tasty to snack on. Worth checking out!
Im here almost every week great coffee.

Went to Wired Coffee a few days ago with my boyfriend and the gentleman who owns the place is a pleasure to speak with, not to mention the coffee was some of the best I've ever had. We will certainly be returning often and hope to make it out for the Ugly Sweater Party Thursday  the 29th. Hope to find more local businesses this friendly and inviting.
best coffee in Kannapolis love it
The white chocolate mocha is so good and cheaper than Starbucks
Coffee was disguising and service sucks I will never go back there again
Wired Coffee Espress understands what it takes in order to craft an irresistible cup of coffee. If taste is your priority, WiredCoffee is where to be! Huge facility, live music, and killer pastries
Best coffee I've ever had period. Gelato is amazing and they have a gift with other treats as well like cookies, banana bread, and pancakes when he does them.

Tasty cappuccino! Pancake Saturday is the time to come.  I ordered blueberry pancakes, and couldn't see the pancakes for all of the tasty blueberries and whipped cream on top.  Nice way to start a day.
Awesome coffee and incredible gelato. I'm very particular about good coffee vs. what claims to be.  This is the best I've had. Great, relaxing lounge and outdoor seating as well.
